member.name: IDWriteFont.CreateFontFace
member.summary: Creates a font face object for the font.
member.param: When this method returns, contains an address of a pointer to the newly created font face object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFont.GetFaceNames
member.summary: Gets a localized strings collection containing the face names for the font (such as Regular or Bold), indexed by locale name.
member.param: When this method returns, contains an address to a pointer to the newly created localized strings object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFont.GetFontFamily
member.summary: Gets the font family to which the specified font belongs.
member.param: When this method returns, contains an address of a pointer to the font family object to which the specified font belongs.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFont.GetInformationalStrings
member.summary: Gets a localized strings collection containing the specified informational strings, indexed by locale name.
member.param: A value that identifies the informational string to get. For example, specifies a string that contains a description of the font.
When this method returns, contains an address of a pointer to the newly created localized strings object.
When this method returns, TRUE if the font contains the specified string ID; otherwise, FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFont.GetMetrics
member.summary: Obtains design units and common metrics for the font face. These metrics are applicable to all the glyphs within a font face and are used by applications for layout calculations.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a structure that has font metrics for the current font face. The metrics returned by this function are in font design units.

member.name: IDWriteFont.GetSimulations
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates what simulations are applied to the specified font.
member.returns: A value that indicates one or more of the types of simulations (none, bold, or oblique) applied to the specified font.

member.name: IDWriteFont.GetStretch
member.summary: Gets the stretch, or width, of the specified font.
member.returns: A value that indicates the type of stretch, or width, applied to the specified font.

member.name: IDWriteFont.GetStyle
member.summary: Gets the style, or slope, of the specified font.
member.returns: A value that indicates the type of style, or slope, of the specified font.

member.name: IDWriteFont.GetWeight
member.summary: Gets the weight, or stroke thickness, of the specified font.
member.returns: A value that indicates the weight for the specified font.

member.name: IDWriteFont.HasCharacter
member.summary: Determines whether the font supports a specified character.
member.param: A Unicode (UCS-4) character value for the method to inspect.
When this method returns, TRUE if the font supports the specified character; otherwise, FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFont.IsSymbolFont
member.summary: Determines whether the font is a symbol font.
member.returns: TRUE if the font is a symbol font; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: IDWriteFont
member.summary: Represents a physical font in a font collection. This interface is used to create font faces from physical fonts, or to retrieve information such as font face metrics or face names from existing font faces.
